You must enter a prompt / description to: Shuru karne ke liye aapko ek prompt / vivaran darz karna hoga
Yahan aap vivaran / prompt darz karke, apni kuch samagri upload karke, aur buddhiman prashno ke uttar dekar samagri (jaise video) utpann kar sakte hain. Yah tez, saral aur atyadhik vyaktigat hai!
You can only upload up to 3 files: Aap keval 3 files tak upload kar sakte hain
Drag and drop files here or click to bro: Yahan files ko khinchen aur choden ya browse karne ke liye click karen
Accepts images (PNG or JPG, under 20MB): Chitra sweekar karta hai (PNG ya JPG, 20MB se kam)
Saving and generating: Save kar raha hai aur utpann kar raha hai
Please upload 1 video and 4 images to co: Kripaya jaari rakhne ke liye 1 video aur 4 chaviyan upload karein
Upload at least 1 video and 4 images to: Apna flow pura karne ke liye kam se kam 1 video aur 4 chaviyan upload karein
Required: 1 video + 4 images minimum. Ac: Aavashyak: nyuntam 1 video + 4 chaviyan. PNG, JPG, MP4 swikar karta hai
Optional - Add context from web links: Vaikalpik - web link se sandarbh jodein
